data.p_name: Aquaspeed Internal Filter - 4W Box
data.p_description:
Aquaspeed 4W Internal Filter: A filter powered by air that effectively oxygenates and filters aquarium water.

A three-lever filter system that effectively traps debris and biologically cleanses water maximizes biological, chemical, and mechanical filtration.

The removable filter box simplifies installation and maintenance.

Fully adjustable water and flow rate provide you the option of redirecting the water flow and at the same time regulating the output volume.

Voltage: 200V-240V | Frequency: 50/60Hz | Power : 4W | F/Max: 220L/H

Always remember to separate the pump unit from the electrical power supply socket before handling or performing maintenance services.

By doing regular maintenance, it can prolong the life span of the pump:

During installation, make sure the pump’s power plug is plugged into the power socket outlet at the higher location.

This is to ensure the water will not backflow view the wire to the socket outlet.

Features

  • Biological, chemical, and mechanical filtration is maximized
  • A removable filter box makes it easier during installation or maintenance

data.p_name: Taiyo Fish Food Vacation Weekend For All Tropical Food - 25g Pack
data.p_description:
Product Description:

The Vacation Fish Food is a convenient solution for feeding your fish while you are away on vacation or unable to attend to their daily feeding needs. Each food block is designed to provide sufficient nutrition for an average ten-gallon aquarium for approximately 3 days.

To ensure optimal performance of the food block, it is recommended to maintain a water temperature of approximately 76 to 78 degrees Fahrenheit (24-25 degrees Celsius). Lower temperatures may slow down the rate of dissolving, while higher temperatures can accelerate the release of food particles.

 

Product Details:

- Product Name: Vacation Fish Food

- Feeding Duration: Approximately 3 days per food block

- Recommended Aquarium Size: Average ten-gallon aquarium

- Water Temperature: Approximately 76 to 78 degrees Fahrenheit (24-25 degrees Celsius)

- Water Change: 10% water change per week

- Water Circulation: Use an air stone or filter for water circulation

data.p_name: S.T.A N-6 Nano Aquarium Lamp - 2.5W Box
data.p_description:
Product Description:

Introducing the Nano Aquarium Lamp 2.5W, a high-quality lighting solution designed to enhance the beauty of your aquarium. This versatile lamp, model STA-N6, seamlessly integrates into your aquarium setup, providing ample lighting for your fish and plants to thrive.

 

Key Features:

 

1. Optimal Lighting Power: With 2.5 watts of power, the Nano Aquarium Lamp ensures sufficient illumination for your aquatic ecosystem. It promotes healthy growth of plants and showcases the vibrant colors of your fish.

 

2. 7 Colors and Customizable Ambiance: The lamp offers 7 different colors, allowing you to create a personalized ambiance in your aquarium. Choose from a range of hues to complement your aquarium's aesthetic or create a captivating visual display.

 

3. Seamless Integration: The Nano Aquarium Lamp is designed to fit seamlessly into your aquarium setup. Its compact size and sleek design ensure that it doesn't disrupt the overall aesthetics of your aquarium.

 

4. Durable Construction: This product is built to last, providing long-lasting performance. Made with quality materials, it is designed to withstand the aquatic environment and maintain its functionality over time.

 

5. Versatile Application: Whether you are a seasoned aquarium enthusiast or a beginner, the Nano Aquarium Lamp is a must-have accessory for any aquarium setup. It adds beauty and visual appeal to your aquatic display, enhancing your overall aquarium experience.

data.p_name: Aquarium Salt - Circle Box
data.p_description:
Aquarium salt(Circle Pot):

Aquarium salt, often used in freshwater aquariums, serves various purposes, including treating sick fish and promoting overall tank health. Here's a concise guide:

Dosage and Usage:

 

1. Dissolve the aquarium salt in a separate container of water. This ensures that the salt is completely dissolved before adding it to the tank.

 

2. The recommended dosage for aquarium salt is typically around 1 tablespoon per 5 gallons of water. However, it is important to follow the specific instructions provided with the product, as dosages may vary.

 

3. Slowly add the dissolved salt mixture to the tank, ensuring that it is evenly distributed. Avoid adding too much salt at once, as sudden changes in salinity can stress the fish.

 

4. Monitor the water parameters regularly, including salinity levels, to ensure they are within the appropriate range for your fish species. Some fish, such as freshwater species that are sensitive to salt, may require lower or no salt levels.

 

5. If using aquarium salt for specific treatments, follow the instructions provided for the specific condition being treated. It is important to note that not all diseases or conditions can be effectively treated with aquarium salt, and consulting with a veterinarian or fish health professional is recommended for proper diagnosis and treatment.

 

Remember, while aquarium salt can be beneficial for freshwater fish in certain situations, it is not suitable for all fish species. Some species, such as those originating from brackish or marine environments, may have specific salt requirements that differ from freshwater species. Always research the specific needs of your fish species before adding aquarium salt to the tank.

attachedFiles_pv_images.title: AquaSpeed A3004BIO,15Watt,Internal Filter For Fish Aquarium 15 Watt

data.p_name: Aquaspeed A3004Bio Internal Filter For Fish Aquarium - 15W
data.p_description:
Description:

The AquaSpeed A3004BIO is a reliable and versatile internal filter that offers efficient filtration, energy efficiency, and convenient maintenance features. It is designed to be fully submersible and provides multi-functionality to ensure a clean and healthy environment for your fish.

 

Product Specifications:

The AquaSpeed A3004BIO is a 15 Watt internal filter specifically designed for fish aquariums.

 

Product Features:

- Multi-function: The AquaSpeed A3004BIO offers multiple functions to ensure efficient filtration and a healthy aquarium environment.

- Energy-efficient: With its 15 Watt power consumption, this filter is designed to be energy-efficient, helping to reduce electricity costs.

- High-quality transparent filter media compartment: The filter includes a transparent compartment that allows easy monitoring of the filter media's condition for convenient maintenance.

- Full submersible/underwater operation: The AquaSpeed A3004BIO is fully submersible, allowing it to function underwater without the need for external plumbing or connections.

- Water filter with oxygen/air pusher: This filter serves as a water filter, effectively removing impurities from the aquarium water. It also features an oxygen/air pusher, providing necessary oxygenation for the fish.

 

Product Details:

- Brand: AquaSpeed

- Model: A3004BIO

- Wattage: 15 Watts

- Type: Internal Aquarium Filter

data.p_name: Aquaspeed A3004Bio Internal Filter For Fish Aquarium - 40W Box
data.p_description:
Product Specification:

The AquaSpeed A3004BIO is a 40 Watt internal aquarium filter designed to provide efficient filtration for your fish tank. 

 

Product Features:

- Multi-functionality: The AquaSpeed A3004BIO offers various functions to ensure the cleanliness and well-being of your aquarium. It provides filtration to remove impurities, oxygenation to maintain optimal oxygen levels, and water circulation to prevent stagnant areas in the tank.

- Energy Efficiency: With its 40 Watt power consumption, the AquaSpeed A3004BIO is designed to be energy-efficient, helping to minimize electricity costs while maintaining effective filtration.

- Transparent Filter Media Compartment: The filter includes a transparent compartment that allows you to easily monitor the filter media's condition and determine when it needs cleaning or replacement. This feature ensures convenient maintenance and optimal performance.

- Fully Submersible: The AquaSpeed A3004BIO is fully submersible, meaning it can be completely immersed in the water of your aquarium. This design allows for efficient filtration throughout the tank, without the need for external plumbing or connections.

- Underwater Water Filter with Oxygen/Air Pusher: The filter serves as an underwater water filter, effectively removing debris, waste, and other impurities from the aquarium water. Additionally, it features an oxygen/air pusher to provide necessary oxygenation for your fish, promoting a healthy aquatic environment.

 

The AquaSpeed A3004BIO is a reliable and versatile internal filter for your fish aquarium. It combines efficient filtration, energy efficiency, and convenient maintenance features to ensure the optimal health and cleanliness of your aquatic ecosystem.

 

Product Details:

- Brand: AquaSpeed

- Model: A3004BIO

- Wattage: 40 Watts

- Type: Internal Aquarium Filter

attachedFiles_pv_images.title: Aquarium Display Decoration Small Sea Life Set Various size

data.p_name: Aquarium Display Decoration Set Sea Life - Small Size Pack
data.p_description:
Product Description:

The Aquarium Display Decoration Small Sea Life Set is a collection of aquarium decorations made from 100% safe resin material. These decorations, including water plants and small castle ornaments, are designed to enhance the visual appeal of your aquarium while providing a natural environment for your fish.

Made from resin, these decorations are free from any special smells and are safe for your fish and the water quality in the tank. The artificial plastic plants are soft and flexible, allowing your fish to swim through them comfortably and providing hiding spots and resting areas.

The small castle decorations in this set feature bright colors and doors, creating an attractive and natural-looking landscape in your home aquarium. They are designed not to fade or discolor, maintaining their vibrant appearance over time. The castle also features multiple holes that serve as hiding places for small fish.

 

Product Details:

- Color: Colorful

- Theme: Fish Tank Decorations

- Material: Resin

data.p_name: XINYOU XY Biochemical Freshwater/Saltwater Fish Tank Super Sponge Filter- 1's Pack
data.p_description:
The XY-280 super biochemical sponge filter provides both mechanical and biological filtration, it is a very easy filter to clean and maintain.

Sponge filters are air driven filters which means that an air pump is required to operate, otherwise this filter can be used in conjunction with other filters.

These filters are very good for fry (baby fish), shrimp and betta tanks, or any other speices that prefers a low water flow.

With a large air pump or blower multiple sponge filters can be used for multiple tanks making them the preferred filtration choice among breeders

9.5cm x 12cm (not including clear tube)

data.p_name: Topka 9.9 Super Flower Horn Pellets - 100g Pack
data.p_description:
Description:Topka 9.9 Super Flower Horn Pellets is a specialized food designed for Flower Horn fish with the 9.9 genetics. This fish food is specifically formulated for Flower Horn fish with the 9.9 genetics. It is tailored to meet the nutritional needs of these fish and promote their overall health and development.

Head Growth and Body Development:

Regular feeding of Topka 9.9 Super Flower Horn Pellets can help induce greater development of the head growth and body of your Flower Horn fish. The high protein content in the pellets supports the growth of these specific features.

Enhanced Color and Body:

The food is formulated to enhance the coloration of your Flower Horn fish, making their colors more vibrant and attractive. It also helps in developing a wider body and fins, giving your fish a more impressive appearance.

Components:

The key components of Topka 9.9 Super Flower Horn Pellets include:

- Protein: The pellets contain over 60% protein, which is crucial for the growth and health of Flower Horn fish.

- Crude Fiber: The crude fiber content is around 6%, which helps support healthy digestion.

- Moisture: The moisture content is less than 6%, ensuring a long shelf life for the pellets.

- Crude Ash: The crude ash content is less than 11%, which indicates the mineral content of the food.

It's worth noting that feeding instructions and additional details may be provided on the packaging of the product. Following the recommended feeding guidelines and consulting with experts in Flower Horn fish care can help ensure the optimal health and well-being of your fish.

attachedFiles_pv_images.title: Topka Platinium Head Huncher E Color Faster High Protein 100gm

data.p_name: Topka Fish Food Head Huncher E Color Faster High Protein
data.p_description:
Description:Topka Platinum Head Huncher Flower Horn Fish Food is a specialized food designed to improve the quality of Flower Horn fish, with a focus on enhancing the head growth. 

Here are some key features of this product:

 

Head Growth Enhancement:

This fish food is formulated to promote bigger humps on the head of Flower Horn fish. Regular feeding with Topka Platinum Head Huncher can help enhance the head growth and give your fish a more impressive appearance.

 

Color Enhancement and Body Development:

In addition to head growth, this food also aims to enhance the coloration of your Flower Horn fish. It can result in better color, wider body, and fins. Additionally, it may promote the development of more peculiar black marks on the body of the fish.

 

Natural Ingredients:

Topka Platinum Head Huncher Flower Horn Fish Food is made with natural ingredients and does not contain chemical or artificial factors. Some of the ingredients include Malt Yeast, White fish, Protein enzymes, Natural immune globulin, Yellow Matter Protein, Vitamins, Natural elements, Soy flour, Fish Protein, Shrimp paste, Organic minerals, Whole egg powder, and Antarctic shrimp meal.

 

Nutrient Content:

The fish food has the following nutrient content:

- Protein: The protein content is greater than 58%, which is essential for the growth and health of Flower Horn fish.

- Crude Ash: The crude ash content is greater than 11%, indicating the mineral content of the food.

- Crude Fiber: The crude fiber content is greater than 6%, which supports healthy digestion.

- Crude Fat: The crude fat content is greater than 6%, providing necessary energy for the fish.

- Moisture: The moisture content is greater than 6%, ensuring the pellets remain fresh.

 

Feeding Instructions:

The recommended feeding instructions for Topka Platinum Head Huncher Flower Horn Fish Food are to feed the fish four times a day. The amount of food should be finished within 5 minutes to prevent overfeeding. After use, it is advised to store the food in a cool and dry place and cover it back properly.

 

Shelf Life:

The maximum shelf life of this fish food is 24 months.

 

It's important to follow the feeding instructions provided.

data.p_name: Rs Electrical High glass Aquarium Heater - 200W Box
data.p_description:
• Product Description:

    The RS Electrical High Glass Aquarium Heater is a top-quality, fully automatic, submersible heater designed for small to medium-sized aquariums. With its double glass protection, this aquarium heater ensures safety and durability. It is suitable for all types of freshwater fish tanks, planted tanks, brackish water tanks, saltwater/marine tanks, and even turtle tanks.

    One of the key features of this aquarium heater is its ability to maintain a stable water temperature, which is crucial for keeping fish healthy and disease-free, especially during the winter season or when weather temperatures fluctuate. This heater provides a reliable and consistent temperature range of 18 to 32 degrees Celsius.



    Product Details:

    - Brand: RS Electrical

    - Model: RS-100W (100 Watt)

    - Type: Glass Aquarium Heater

    - Power Supply: AC 220-240V

    - Wattage Options: 50W, 100W, 150W, 200W

    - Submersible: Yes

    - Temperature Range: 18 to 32 degrees Celsius
